verses.roman:
tomāra caraṇa-kṛpā hañāche tāhāre
chatre māgi' khāya, 'viṣaya' sparśa nāhi kare

synonyms: tomāra caraṇa—of Your lotus feet; kṛpā—the mercy; hañāche—has been; tāhāre—upon him; chatre—from centers for the distribution of food; māgi'-begging; khāya—he eats; viṣaya—money; sparśa nāhi kare—he does not touch.
translation: "However, because he has received the mercy of Your lotus feet, he does not even accept his father's money. Instead he eats by begging alms from centers for the distribution of food.
